author: Xbox
description:

author: Xbox
description:
Discover a new desert biome called Burning Springs, located in post-nuclear Ohio, where an intelligent Super Mutant called The Rust King rules over deathclaws and raiders. Head to the local watering hole and meet a well-known gunslinger looking to give out Bounty Hunts – The Ghoul from the Fallout TV series.

The Ghoul is open for business in Burning Springs – take on low level Bounty Hunting events to earn more daring challenges and earn caps and legendary items. More dangerous bounties also give a chance to earn one of dozens unique mods benefitting both human and ghouls.

Team up to complete two new public events: Aid the Rust King’s Beastmaster with their menagerie of Deathclaws used in the arena in “Gearing  Up” and protect the citizens of Highwaytown from a volatile swarm of Radscorpions and Stingwings in “Sinkhole Solutions!”

Fallout 76: Burning Springs is a free update coming December 2.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https
title: Fallout 76: Burning Springs Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Relive the best moments from our Fall ID@Xbox Showcase with IGN. The show was jam packed with news and updates on 22 exciting ID@Xbox games from our studio partners from around the world. We shared updates from Invincible VS and Aphelion, had World Premiers for Darkwood 2 & Puppergeist, had Game Pass announcements for 14 games and 20 Xbox Play Anywhere titles! 

Read the full recap on Xbox Wire: https://news.xbox.com/2025/10/28/id-xbox-showcase-october-2025-everything-announced-recap

author: Xbox
description:
Inspired by the cartoons your grandparents probably watched, MOUSE: P.I. For Hire is a hand-crafted video game like you have never experienced before.

Go behind the scenes with Fumi Games for a deeper look at this highly anticipated first-person shooter. Hear directly from the developers on the game's hand-crafted visuals, noir-fueled detective story, action-packed combat, and so much more.

MOUSE: P.I. For Hire launches on Xbox Series X|S on March 19 2026.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mouse-pi-for-hire/9p7522hwd0nh

author: Xbox
description:
If you like a mix of tower defense and city building, a unique roguelike mining adventure, or an immersive sci-fi horror, Raw Fury & Xbox Game Pass has got you covered. 

Monsters Are Coming! Rock & Road (PC, Cloud, XPA) and ROUTINE (PC, Xbox, Cloud, XPA) can both be played day one with Xbox Game Pass on November 20, and December 4. As well as fan-favorite, Dome Keeper (Xbox PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Cloud, XPA) which joins Game Pass December 9. 

Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/p/9PJBKF27C16M/0010
